original_text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain: and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them. And he suffered them.
korean_text: 마침 그 곳에 많은 돼지 떼가 산에서 먹고 있는지라 귀신들이 그 돼지에게로 들어가게 허락하심을 간구하니 이에 허락하시니

sentences.original_text: And there was there an herd of many swine
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에 많은 돼지 떼가 있었다

sentences.original_text: that he would suffer them to enter into them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들이 그들 안으로 들어가도록 허락해 달라고
